00020         this->Survivors_PilotChance.SetAll(int(RulesClass::Instance->CrewEscape * 100));

void TechnoTypeExt::TechnoTypeExt::ExtData::LoadFromINIFile ( TT *  pThis,
CCINIClass *  pINI 
) [virtual] 

00081 {
00082         const char * section = pThis->ID;
00083 
00084         if(!pINI->GetSection(section)) {
00085                 return;
00086         }
00087 
00088         // survivors
00089         this->Survivors_Pilots.SetCapacity(SideClass::Array->Count, NULL);
00090 
00091         this->Survivors_PilotCount = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "Survivor.Pilots", this->Survivors_PilotCount);
00092 
00093         this->Survivors_PilotChance.LoadFromINI(pINI, section, "Survivor.%sPilotChance");
00094         this->Survivors_PassengerChance.LoadFromINI(pINI, section, "Survivor.%sPassengerChance");
00095 
00096         char flag[256];
00097         for(int i = 0; i < SideClass::Array->Count; ++i) {
00098                 _snprintf(flag, 256, "Survivor.Side%d", i);
00099                 if(pINI->ReadString(section, flag, "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00100                         this->Survivors_Pilots[i] = InfantryTypeClass::Find(Ares::readBuffer);
00101                 }
00102         }
00103 
00104         // prereqs
00105         int PrereqListLen = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "Prerequisite.Lists", this->PrerequisiteLists.Count - 1);
00106 
00107         if(PrereqListLen < 1) {
00108                 PrereqListLen = 0;
00109         }
00110         ++PrereqListLen;
00111         while(PrereqListLen > this->PrerequisiteLists.Count) {
00112                 this->PrerequisiteLists.AddItem(new DynamicVectorClass<int>);
00113         }
00114 
00115         DynamicVectorClass<int> *dvc = this->PrerequisiteLists.GetItem(0);
00116         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "Prerequisite", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00117                 Prereqs::Parse(Ares::readBuffer, dvc);
00118         }
00119         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "PrerequisiteOverride", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00120                 dvc = &pThis->PrerequisiteOverride;
00121                 Prereqs::Parse(Ares::readBuffer, dvc);
00122         }
00123         for(int i = 0; i < this->PrerequisiteLists.Count; ++i) {
00124                 _snprintf(flag, 256, "Prerequisite.List%d", i);
00125                 if(pINI->ReadString(section, flag, "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00126                         dvc = this->PrerequisiteLists.GetItem(i);
00127                         Prereqs::Parse(Ares::readBuffer, dvc);
00128                 }
00129         }
00130 
00131         dvc = &this->PrerequisiteNegatives;
00132         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "Prerequisite.Negative", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00133                 Prereqs::Parse(Ares::readBuffer, dvc);
00134         }
00135 
00136         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "Prerequisite.RequiredTheaters", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00137                 this->PrerequisiteTheaters = 0;
00138                 for(char *cur = strtok(Ares::readBuffer, ","); cur; cur = strtok(NULL, ",")) {
00139                         signed int idx = Theater::FindIndex(cur);
00140                         if(idx != -1) {
00141                                 this->PrerequisiteTheaters |= (1 << idx);
00142                         }
00143                 }
00144         }
00145 
00146         // new secret lab
00147         this->Secret_RequiredHouses
00148                 = pINI->ReadHouseTypesList(section, "SecretLab.RequiredHouses", this->Secret_RequiredHouses);
00149 
00150         this->Secret_ForbiddenHouses
00151                 = pINI->ReadHouseTypesList(section, "SecretLab.ForbiddenHouses", this->Secret_ForbiddenHouses);
00152 
00153         this->Is_Deso = pINI->ReadBool(section, "IsDesolator", this->Is_Deso);
00154         this->Is_Deso_Radiation = pINI->ReadBool(section, "IsDesolator.RadDependant", this->Is_Deso_Radiation);
00155         this->Is_Cow  = pINI->ReadBool(section, "IsCow", this->Is_Cow);
00156 
00157         this->Is_Spotlighted = pINI->ReadBool(section, "HasSpotlight", this->Is_Spotlighted);
00158         this->Spot_Height = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "Spotlight.StartHeight", this->Spot_Height);
00159         this->Spot_Distance = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "Spotlight.Distance", this->Spot_Distance);
00160         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "Spotlight.AttachedTo", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00161                 if(!_strcmpi(Ares::readBuffer, "body")) {
00162                         this->Spot_AttachedTo = sa_Body;
00163                 } else if(!_strcmpi(Ares::readBuffer, "turret")) {
00164                         this->Spot_AttachedTo = sa_Turret;
00165                 } else if(!_strcmpi(Ares::readBuffer, "barrel")) {
00166                         this->Spot_AttachedTo = sa_Barrel;
00167                 }
00168         }
00169         this->Spot_DisableR = pINI->ReadBool(section, "Spotlight.DisableRed", this->Spot_DisableR);
00170         this->Spot_DisableG = pINI->ReadBool(section, "Spotlight.DisableGreen", this->Spot_DisableG);
00171         this->Spot_DisableB = pINI->ReadBool(section, "Spotlight.DisableBlue", this->Spot_DisableB);
00172         this->Spot_Reverse = pINI->ReadBool(section, "Spotlight.IsInverted", this->Spot_Reverse);
00173 
00174         this->Is_Bomb = pINI->ReadBool(section, "IsBomb", this->Is_Bomb);
00175 
00176 /*
00177         this is too late - Art files are loaded before this hook fires... brilliant
00178         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "WaterVoxel", "", buffer, 256)) {
00179                 this->WaterAlt = 1;
00180         }
00181 */
00182 
00183         INI_EX exINI(pINI);
00184         this->Insignia.LoadFromINI(pINI, section, "Insignia.%s");
00185         this->Parachute_Anim.Parse(&exINI, section, "Parachute.Anim");
00186 
00187         // new on 08.11.09 for #342 (Operator=)
00188         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "Operator", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) { // try to read the flag
00189                 this->IsAPromiscuousWhoreAndLetsAnyoneRideIt = (strcmp(Ares::readBuffer, "_ANY_") == 0); // set whether this type accepts all operators
00190                 if(!this->IsAPromiscuousWhoreAndLetsAnyoneRideIt) { // if not, find the specific operator it allows
00191                         this->Operator = InfantryTypeClass::Find(Ares::readBuffer);
00192                 }
00193         }
00194 
00195         this->CameoPal.LoadFromINI(CCINIClass::INI_Art, pThis->ImageFile, "CameoPalette");
00196 
00197         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "Prerequisite.StolenTechs", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00198                 this->RequiredStolenTech.reset();
00199                 for(char *cur = strtok(Ares::readBuffer, ","); cur; cur = strtok(NULL, ",")) {
00200                         signed int idx = atoi(cur);
00201                         if(idx > -1 && idx < 32) {
00202                                 this->RequiredStolenTech.set(idx);
00203                         }
00204                 }
00205         }
00206 
00207         // EMP immunity. The default for each type is decided by the EMPulse class,
00208         // the first time a unit of this TechnoType is EMP'd.
00209         bool EMPTemp = pINI->ReadBool(section, "ImmuneToEMP", false);
00210         this->ImmuneToEMP.Set(EMPTemp);
00211         this->ImmuneToEMPSet.Set((EMPTemp == pINI->ReadBool(section, "ImmuneToEMP", true)));
00212 
00213         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "VeteranAbilities", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00214                 for(char *cur = strtok(Ares::readBuffer, ","); cur; cur = strtok(NULL, ",")) {
00215                         if(!_strcmpi(cur, "empimmune")) {
00216                                 this->VeteranAbilityEMPIMMUNE = true;
00217                                 this->EliteAbilityEMPIMMUNE = true;
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220         }
00221 
00222         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "EliteAbilities", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00223                 for(char *cur = strtok(Ares::readBuffer, ","); cur; cur = strtok(NULL, ",")) {
00224                         if(!_strcmpi(cur, "empimmune")) {
00225                                 this->EliteAbilityEMPIMMUNE = true;
00226                         }
00227                 }
00228         }
00229 
00230         // #733
00231         this->ProtectedDriver = pINI->ReadBool(section, "ProtectedDriver", this->ProtectedDriver);
00232         this->CanDrive = pINI->ReadBool(section, "CanDrive", this->CanDrive);
00233 
00234         // quick fix - remove after the rest of weapon selector code is done
00235         return;
00236 }

bool TechnoTypeExt::TechnoTypeExt::ExtData::IsAPromiscuousWhoreAndLetsAnyoneRideIt

If this is true, Operator= is not checked, and the object will work with any passenger, provided there is one.

See also:
InfantryTypeClass * Operator

InfantryTypeClass* TechnoTypeExt::TechnoTypeExt::ExtData::Operator

Saves a pointer to an InfantryType required to be a passenger of this unit in order for it to work. Defaults to NULL.
